title: dmb2008.9.6-IEM
description:
I did not record this
--
Dave Matthews Band
University of CA, Berkeley Greek Theatre
Berkeley, CA
September 6, 2008

Taper: FMmodulator
Location: Does it matter?
Source: IEM Reciever > Iriver 320
Conversion: Iriver 320 > Adobe Audition 3.0 > flac frontend

Remastered a bit with waves plugins L3 and Q4 Eq, and Audition&#039;s noise autoheal for a few static bursts. Put track fades on the beginning and ending, but you can break the CDs however you want to. 

***DO NOT DISTRIBUTE IN LOSSY FORMATS***


01 Intro
02 Seek Up
03 Proudest Monkey
04 Satellite
05 Pantala Naga Pampa > Rapunzel
06 Louisiana Bayou
07 Out Of My Hands
08 Fuzzy Wuzzy (Improv)
09 Sledgehammer
10 Lover Lay Down
11 Rhyme And Reason
12 Jimi Thing
13 Where Are You Going
14 Money
15 Warehouse
16 Stay (Wasting Time)
17 Encore Break
18 Anyone Seen The Bridge
19 Too Much
20 All Along The Watchtower

Pretty good sounding feed. Pretty evenly balanced with a good amount of horns (although I know its not the Sax/Trumpet mix). Good amount of backing vocals. I&#039;m not a huge DMB fan so I can&#039;t really pass too much judgment. Vocals get kinda low on &#039;Out of my Hands&#039; if I recall correctly.

Special thanks to Alex Coluzzi for all the help and education concerning how to record the DMB with wireless devices - you really are the king of the airwaves!
